front.title: Full Scale Alert
front.gametext: Use 2 Force. Draw Destiny. If destiny < number of Stormtroopers on the table, all opponent's movement is blocked for the remainder of this turn (except for smugglers and the starships they are aboard).
front.lore: Imperial stormtroopers adopt strict security measures. Excellent communications and sheer numbers can hinder Rebel movement across entire territories.

rulings: The phrase 'movement is blocked' means the cards cannot move.
